div.p: This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li: Include all codes defined in http://www.whocc.no/atc

div.p: Note: The currently implemented code system and the value set expansion contain only a set of example ATC codes, not the complete code system content.

description.value: World Health Organization Anatomical Therapeutic Chemical (ATC) classification system.

copyright.value: This artefact includes content from Anatomical Therapeutic Chemical (ATC) classification system. ATC codes are copyright World Health Organization (WHO) Collaborating Centre for Drug Statistics Methodology. Terms & Conditions in https://www.whocc.no/use_of_atc_ddd/
